name: Void Wisp
description: The rules of Void Wisp are simple: Gain points by getting close without crashing. Lose points by playing it safe. Distance isn’t important. Simple controls and custom game options means anyone can pick up and play this high score focused ambient runner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i3+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics Storage: 270 MB available space
